depends_on.help: Select the areas where this area depends on.
depends_on.label: Depends on

enclosure.help: Select the enclosure where this area belongs to.
enclosure.label: Enclosure

light_sensors.help: Select the lights sensors to detect if the lights are on.
light_sensors.label: Light detecting sensors

mode.help: Select the mode of this area. This will change the timing and duration of the relays.
mode.label: Mode

name.help: Enter an easy to remember name.
name.invalid: The entered name is not valid. It cannot be empty.
name.label: Name

error.duplicate_relays: You have selected the same relay(s) in both the low and high alarm. This is not valid.
error.required_fields: Not all required fields are entered correctly.

difference.help: Enter a negative or positive value for a relative action. A number is treated as an absolute value.
difference.label: Difference

duration.help: Enter a duration in minutes or the actual time of the day.

external_source.help: Enter a full url to the external source according to the Remote data feature.
external_source.label: External source url

area_variation.help: Here you can enter periods where the sensors will change their values according to the list below. Make sure the periods are in chronological order!

period.help: Change to value after x minutes or at a specific time.
period.label: Period/duration

value.help: Enter a negative or positive offset value.

day_night_difference.help: Amount to change between day and night.
day_night_difference.label: Day/night difference

deviation_high_alarm.help: Increase or decrease high alarm value.
deviation_high_alarm.label: High alarm deviation

deviation_low_alarm.help: Increase or decrease low alarm value.
deviation_low_alarm.label: Low alarm deviation

begin.help: The time of the day when the relays are toggled on each night.
begin.label: Begin time

depend_on_relays.help: Select the relays of which these relays are depending on.
depend_on_relays.label: Depend on relays

end.help: The time of the day when the relays are toggled off each night.
end.label: End time

ignore_high.help: Toggle to ignore the high alarm value of the sensors, and use the low alarm value only.
ignore_high.label: Ignore high alarm

off_duration.help: The duration when the relays should be stay off when switched off. Enter '0' to disable.
off_duration.invalid: Enter a valid duration in minutes.
off_duration.label: Off duration

on_duration.help: The duration when the relays should be on. If this is shorter then all day, you will get a timer functionality. Enter '0' to have a full night.
on_duration.invalid: Enter a valid duration in minutes.
on_duration.label: On duration

playlists.help: Select the playlist(s) to be played.
playlists.label: Playlists

power_on_time.help: The duration in seconds to toggle on the relay.
power_on_time.label: Power on time

settle_time.help: The duration in seconds between two actions.
settle_time.label: Settle time

trigger_threshold.help: Enter the amount of alarms before action take place.
trigger_threshold.label: Alarm threshold

dimmer.info: Select the delay and duration for the dimmer to go to on or off in minutes. Max duration is 180 minutes.

relay.info: Select the delay in minutes that a relay waits before it turns on. Max delay is 180 minutes.

dimmer.info: Select the delay and duration for the dimmer to go to on or off in minutes. Max duration is 180 minutes.

main_lights.help: Toggle this if this is the main lights for this enclosure. This is used for the light checks in other areas.
main_lights.label: Main lights

max_day_hours.help: The maximum amount of hours that the lights are turned on. This is only valid in weather mode. When the day is longer then this maximum value, the day will be shortened to this maximum value.
max_day_hours.invalid: The entered value is not valid. Enter a valid number between {min} and {max}.
max_day_hours.label: Maximum hours

min_day_hours.help: The minimum amount of hours that the lights are turned on. This is only valid in weather mode. When the day is shorter then this minimum value, the day will be extended to this minimum value.
min_day_hours.invalid: The entered value is not valid. Enter a valid number between {min} and {max}.
min_day_hours.label: Minimum hours

periods.info: Below you can per select the relays and timer settings per period daytime and nighttime.

sensors.help: Select sensors to use for sensor based mode.
sensors.label: Sensors

shift_day_hours.help: The amount of time to shift in hours based on the sun rise time. Negative values will make the day start earlier.
shift_day_hours.invalid: The entered value is not valid. Enter a valid number between {min} and {max}.
shift_day_hours.label: Hours shift
